attributes.action: The UK must accelerate decarbonisation to limit dangerous climate change
attributes.additional_details:
Human activities have caused approximately 1°C of global warming above pre-industrial levels. This contributes to extreme weather, ecosystem damage, sea-level rise, species extinction, inequality and the mental health crisis. 

Action is urgently needed. Already 60 local authorities in the UK have declared a Climate Emergency. 

We ask the UK Government to increase its ambition by implementing policies and working with the private sector to accelerate the decarbonisation of our economy.
attributes.background:
This petition is calling for the UK Government to accelerate decarbonisation in order to give this and the next generations the best chance of a stable future.

Existing UK carbon reduction targets do not go far enough to prevent dangerous climate change and more ambition is needed.
